.. _lsst.ctrl.platform.s3df-contributing:

Contributing
============

``lsst.ctrl.platform.s3df`` is developed at https://github.com/lsst/ctrl_platform_s3df.
You can find Jira issues for this module under the `ctrl_platform_s3df <https://jira.lsstcorp.org/issues/?jql=project%20%3D%20DM%20AND%20component%20%3D%20ctrl_platform_s3df>`_ component.

.. If there are topics related to developing this module (rather than using it), link to this from a toctree placed here.
